knimeNode.name: Google Spreadsheet Updater
knimeNode.shortDescription: Update a table in Google Sheets

fullDescription.intro:
Takes the values in the given table and updates the values in the specified spreadsheet according to the specified range in A1 notation.
Attention: Be aware that behavior is not defined if the range (given in A1 notaton) does not correspond to the input table size.
For more information about the A1 notation visit:
developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#a1_notation
fullDescription.option: The name of the spreadsheet to be created.
The name of the sheet to which the table should be written.
The Range where the table content should be written to.
Whether the cells should be written in raw format. E.g. so that "=xy" is not interpreted as a formula.

ports.inPort: Table to be written to a google sheet
ports.outPort: Table containing the spreadsheet name, sheet name and spreadsheet ID.
